author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Enova Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.20
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Enova International Inc:
* ENOVA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20 * ‍TOTAL REVENUE OF $243.7 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2017 INCREASED 20.4% FROM $202.4 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2016​
* ‍FOR Q1 OF 2018, ENOVA EXPECTS TOTAL REVENUE OF $220 MILLION TO $240 MILLION​
* ‍FOR Q1 OF 2018, EXPECTS GAAP RESULTS OF $0.44 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE TO $0.65 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE​
* ‍FOR Q1 OF 2018, ENOVA EXPECTS ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $0.59 TO $0.81​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, ENOVA EXPECTS TOTAL REVENUE OF $940 MILLION TO $1 BILLION​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, ENOVA EXPECTS GAAP DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $1.51 TO $2.04​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, ENOVA EXPECTS ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $1.83 TO $2.37​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
